message: Let's get started! I'm offering you 20% of the initial amount. Accept and we can end the game early.
Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You rejected the 50/50 split, so I'm offering a slightly better deal. Still a good chance to end the game early!
I'll take a slightly bigger share this time, but still a fair offer!
Inflation is eating away at the money, so I'm adjusting my offer. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm willing to give you a smaller share this time, but I still want a decent chunk!
I'm taking a risk, but I need to get a bigger share to make this worth it. Take it or leave it!
I'm taking a risk too, I want the majority of the remaining money!
I'm going all-in! Take this offer and I'll at least get something out of this game.
I'm going all-in too! I want the majority of the remaining money!
